author: Special Correspondent
text:
Huge crowd throngs the ‘Build Tech Expo 2016,’ being organised by the Tirunelveli District Civil Engineers’ Association at Centenary Hall to take a look at the modern construction materials displayed there.

Various companies manufacturing construction materials including steel, tiles, light weight concrete bricks, security systems, paints, paver blocks, electric cables and lights etc. have exhibited their products in 52 stalls.

Upcoming apartments and independent houses projects in and around Tirunelveli, modular kitchen models, cupboards etc. have also been displayed.

Experts drawn from the construction industry will interact with visitors between 6 p.m. and 9 p.m. everyday to clear their doubts pertaining to construction of their dream homes and commercial complexes.

G. Sakthinathan, Dean, Anna University Regional Office, Tirunelveli, inaugurated the four-day fair on Saturday in the presence of R. Siavalingam, president, Federation of All Civil Engineers Association of Tamil Nadu and Puducherry, R. Mohanraj, past president of the federation, and G. Sokkanathan, president, Tirunelveli District Civil Engineers’ Association.
title: ‘Build Tech Expo 2016’ draws huge crowd
